      • printHotel

        public abstract void printHotel​()

      • exit

        protected boolean exit​(java.lang.String name)
        This method will be used by subclasses to exit guest
        Parameters:
        name - who will be exited the room
        Returns:
        true if process is successful, name valid

      • exit

        protected boolean exit​(java.lang.String name,
                       int roomNum)
        This method will be used by subclasses to exit guest
        Parameters:
        name - who will be exited the room
        roomNum - the room number will be exited if more than one room is reserved/booked
        Returns:
        true if process is successful, name and number valid

      • enter

        protected boolean enter​(java.lang.String name,
                        int roomNumber,
                        int personNumber,
                        char book)
        This method will be used to book the room
        Parameters:
        name - is guest name
        roomNumber - is number that wanted to booked
        personNumber - is number of person stays in the room
        book - the book situation (for reserved R, for booked B)
        Returns:
        true if booking the room process is successful. It may already booked or room number may not be available

      • searchRoom

        protected int searchRoom​(java.lang.String value)
        This method searchs room
        Parameters:
        value - guest name for searching
        Returns:
        if value couldn't find, returns -1; if found, returns index.

      • readFile

        protected boolean readFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        This method reads information about hotel rooms from .csv file
        Parameters:
        filename - is input file for guest-hotel info
        Returns:
        true if the file is read successfully

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        This method writes updated information about hotel room to same .csv file
        Parameters:
        filename - target filename to write room information
